entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early in the afternoon then clearing. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
